constituent: exhibit, line up, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, east, tree, wood, sun, day
koohiiStory1: Every morning at The Pinnacle, the residents line upon the East side for morning stretches and leisure.
koohiiStory2: Hikers line up to get to the top of that great pinnacle of the East... Mount Fuji. Seriously, they really do! ...probably the only mountain in the world with a queue at the top.
words: 陳列(ちんれつ): exhibition, display, show
